title: U.N General Assembly 2019: Live Streaming Video Coverage & Analysis
text:
Yeah, Ryan, apparently Jair Bolsonaro, the Brazilian president, is going to try and head off the issue in his own speech this morning. But I think the person who best described his predicament is the former head of Brazil’s Foreign Ministry, Marcos Azambuja, who has a pretty scathing opinion piece in the Brazilian newspaper O Globo.

“I have no advice for whoever is preparing our speech. I’d just like to recall the … warning once given to two inexperienced hedgehogs about how to make love… be careful.”
